DOC.brief_summary: This trial is a randomized, double-blind, placebo controlled trial designed to test whether two years treatment of preschool children aged 2-3 years of age at high risk for asthma with omalizumab (anti-IgE) for two years will prevent the progression to childhood asthma, as reflected by a reduction in the prevalence of active asthma in the Final 12 months during 2 year observation period off study drug.
DOC.brief_title: Controlling and Preventing Asthma Progression and Severity in Kids
DOC.criteria: 2447 months at randomization positive allergy to aeroallergen 12 wheezing episodes past year other chronic lung disease besides asthma allergy to study medication
